feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: 2019-08-30: v. 7.8 is available
entry.content: v. 7.8 is available. Introduced an option for limiting the observation time interval and to display an image overlay on video.
entry.summary: v. 7.8 is available. Introduced an option for limiting the observation time interval and to display an image overlay on video.

entry.title: 2019-08-16: v. 7.7.4 is available
entry.content: v. 7.7.4 is available. Some bugs fixed.
entry.summary: v. 7.7.4 is available. Some bugs fixed.

entry.title: 2019-06-18: v. 7.7.3 is available
entry.content: v. 7.7.3 is available. Severe regression (introduced on v.7.7.1) fixed.
entry.summary: v. 7.7.3 is available. Severe regression (introduced on v.7.7.1) fixed.

entry.title: 2019-06-13: v. 7.7.1 is available
entry.content: v. 7.7.1 is available. Introduced possibility to edit negative times or over 24h. Some bugs fixed
entry.summary: v. 7.7.1 is available. Introduced possibility to edit negative times or over 24h. Some bugs fixed

entry.title: 2019-05-23: Free Mini-workshop: Behavioral Analysis with BORIS
entry.content:
Aula 4, Dept. Life Sciences and Systems Biology, Via Accademia Albertina 13, 10123 Torino, Italy. h. 10:00 - 13:00 and 14:00 - 17:00 - 25 places available (bring your own laptop with the last version of BORIS).
See the above link for the detailed program. Please register at https://framadate.org/woVkIofKthFgmoI9
entry.summary:
